Verses: 1 siraiyiruppilirundhu Vandha Janangal Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aalayaththaik Kattugiraargalendru Yoodhaavukkum Benyameenukkumirundha Saththurukkal Kelvippattapodhu,

2 avargal Serubaabelidaththukkum Thalaivaraana Pidhaakkalidaththukkum Vandhu; Ungalodekooda Naangalum Kattuvom; Ungalaippola Naangalum Ungal Dhevanai Naaduvom; Ivvidaththukku Engalai Varappannina Aseeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Esaraththon Naatkal Mudharkondu Avarukku Naangalum Paliyittuvarugiromendru Avargalode Sonnaargal.

3 adharku Serubaabelum, Yesuvaavum, Isravelil Matrumulla Thalaivaraana Pidhaakkalum Avargalai Nokki: Engal Dhevanukku Aalayaththaik Kattugiradharku Ungalukkum Engalukkum Sambandhamillai; Persiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Kores Raajaa Engalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadi, Naangale Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Adhaik Kattuvom Endraargal.
4 adhinaal Andha Dhesaththu Janangal Yoodhaa Janaththin Kaigalaith Thalarappanni, Kattaadhapadikku Avargalai Sangadappaduththi,

5 persiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Koresin Kaalamuzhudhum, Thariyu Ennum Persiyaa Raajaa Arasaandakaalamattum, Avargal Yosanaiyai Avaththamaakkumpadi Avargalukku Virodhamaai Aalosanaikkaararukkuk Kaikkooli Kattinaargal.
6 akaasveru Arasaalugirapodhu, Avanudaiya Raajyabaaraththin Thuvakkaththile, Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilum Kudiyirukkiravargalukku Virodhamaagap Piriyaadhu Ezhudhinaargal.

7 ardhasashtaavin Naatkalilum, Pislaamum, Miththiredhaaththum, Thaabeyelum, Matrumulla Avargal Vagaiyaraavum, Persiyaa Raajaavaana Ardhasashtaavukku Oru Manu Ezhudhinaargal; Andha Manu Seeriya Ezhuththilum Seeriyabaashaiyilum Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
8 aalosanaith Thalaivanaagiya Rekoomum Kanakkanaagiya Simsaavum Erusalemukku Virodhamaaga Ardhasashtaa Ennum Raajaavukku Ezhudhina Manuvile Kaiyoppam Pottavargal Yaarendraal:

9 aalosanaith Thalaivanaagiya Rekoomum, Kanakkanaagiya Simsaayum, Matrumulla Avargal Vagaiyaraavaagiya Theenaaviyar, Abarchaaththiyar, Tharpeliyar, Appaarsiyar, Arkeviyar, Baabiloniyar, Sooshangiyar, Thegaaviyar, Elaamiyaraanavargalum,
10 periyavarum Perpetravarumaana Asnaappaar Avvidangalilirundhu Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu Samaariyaavin Pattanaththai Kudiyerappannina Matra Janangalum, Nadhikku Ippaale Irukkira Matra Janangalume.
11 avargal Ardhasashtaa Ennum Raajaavukku Anuppina Manuvin Nagalaavadhu: Nadhikku Ippuraththil Irukkira Umadhu Adiyaar Mudhalaanavargal Arivikkiradhu Ennavendraal,

12 ummidaththilirundhu Engalidaththirku Vandha Yoodhar Erusalemile Koodi, Kalagamum Pollaappumaana Andhap Pattanaththirku Asthibaarangalai Inaiththu, Adhin Madhilgalai Ezhuppikkattugiraargal Enbadhu Raajaavukku Ariyalaavadhaaga.

13 ippodhum Indhap Pattanam Kattappattu, Alangangal Eduppikkappattuth Theerndhaal, Avargal Pagudhiyaiyum Theervaiyaiyum Aayaththaiyum Kodukkamaattaargal; Adhinaal Raajaakkalin Varumaanaththirku Nashtam Varum Endru Raajaavukku Ariyalaavadhaaga.
14 ippodhum Naangal Aramanai Upputh Thingirapadiyinaal, Raajaavukkuk Kuraivuvarap Paarththirukkiradhu Engalukku Adaadhakaariyam; Aagaiyaal Naangal Idhai Anuppi, Raajaavukkuth Theriyappaduththugirom.

15 ummudaiya Pidhaakkalin Nadapadipusthagangalil Sodhiththuppaarkka Uththaravaagavendum; Appozhudhu Indhap Pattanam Kalagamum, Raajaakkalukkum Seemaigalukkum Nashtamum Undaakkugira Pattanam Endrum, Poorvakaalamudhal Kalaadhi Ulladhaayirundhapadiyinaal Indhap Pattanam Paazhkkadikkappattadhu Endrum, Andha Nadapadipusthagangalil Kandariyalaam.

16 aagaiyaal Indhap Pattanam Kattappattu Idhin Alangangal Eduppikkappattuth Theerndhaal, Nadhikku Ippuraththile Umakku Ondrum Iraadhepom Enbadhai Raajaavukku Ariyappaduththugirom Endru Ezhudhi Anuppinaargal.

17 appozhudhu Raajaa Aalosanaiththalaivanaagiya Rekoomukkum, Kanakkanaagiya Simsaayikkum, Samaariyaavil Kudiyirukkira Matrumulla Avargaludaiya Vagaiyaraavukkum, Nadhikku Appuraththil Irukkira Matravargalukkum Ezhudhiyanuppina Pradhiyuththaramaavadhu: Ungalukku Samaadhaanam,
18 neengal Anuppina Manu Namadhu Samugaththil Theerkkamaai Vaasikkappattadhu.
19 nammudaiya Uththaravinaal Sodhiththup Paarkkumpodhu, Andhap Pattanam Poorvakaalamudhal Raajaakkalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbinadhu Endrum, Adhile Kalagamum Raajadhrogamum Kaanappattadhu Endrum,

20 erusalemil Vallamaiyulla Raajaakkal Irundhaargal Endrum, Avargal Nadhikku Appuraththil Irukkira Sagala Dhesangalaiyum Aanduvandhaargal Endrum Pagudhiyum Theervaiyum Aayamum Avargalukku Seluththappattadhu Endrum Theriyavarugiradhu.
21 ippozhudhum Nammidaththilirundhu Maruuththaravu Pirakkumvaraiyum Andha Manidhar Andhap Pattanaththaik Kattaamal Niruththividumpadi Kattalaiyidungal.
22 idhile Neengal Thavaraadhapadi Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Raajaakkalukku Nashtamum Sedhamum Varavendiyadhu Enna Endru Ezhudhi Anuppinaan.

23 raajaavaagiya Ardhasashtaavudaiya Uththaravin Nagal Rekoomukkum, Kanakkanaagiya Simsaayikkum, Avargal Vagaiyaraavukku Munbaaga Vaasikkappattapodhu, Avargal Theeviraththudane Erusalemilirukkira Yoodharidaththirkup Poi, Balavandhaththodum Kattaayaththodum Avargalai Velaiseyyaadhapadikku Niruththippottaargal.
24 appozhudhu Erusalemilulla Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Velai Thadaipattu, Persiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Thariyu Raajyabaarampannina Irandaam Varushamattum Niruththappattirundhadhu.
